Parameters

add_destination(destination, path, nh, event=None)[source]¶

Function that adds a destination to the data structure that manage destinations that needs to be shared inside the node

Parameters

  • destination – destination that is originated by the node

  • path – path to the destination

  • nh – nh for the route

add_neighbor(link)[source]¶

Add a neighbor to the set of neighbors If the neighbor is already in the set it throws an error and terminate

Parameters

link – link that has to be added
